pullRequest.body:
We're still quite far away from the final goal `ClosedUnderLimitsOfShape WalkingParallelPair (IsIndObject (C := C))`, but this is some progress in that direction.

---

On the branch `ind-finite-limits` I assume

```lean
structure CommonMorphismPresentation {A B : C·µí·µñ ‚•§ Type v} (f g : A ‚ü∂ B) where
  I : Type v
  [‚Ñê : SmallCategory I]
  [hI : IsFiltered I]
  F‚ÇÅ : I ‚•§ C
  F‚ÇÇ : I ‚•§ C
  Œπ‚ÇÅ : F‚ÇÅ ‚ãô yoneda ‚ü∂ (Functor.const I).obj A
  isColimit‚ÇÅ : IsColimit (Cocone.mk A Œπ‚ÇÅ)
  Œπ‚ÇÇ : F‚ÇÇ ‚ãô yoneda ‚ü∂ (Functor.const I).obj B
  isColimit‚ÇÇ : IsColimit (Cocone.mk B Œπ‚ÇÇ)
  œÜ : F‚ÇÅ ‚ü∂ F‚ÇÇ
  œà : F‚ÇÅ ‚ü∂ F‚ÇÇ
  hf : f = IsColimit.map isColimit‚ÇÅ (Cocone.mk B Œπ‚ÇÇ) (whiskerRight œÜ yoneda)
  hg : g = IsColimit.map isColimit‚ÇÅ (Cocone.mk B Œπ‚ÇÇ) (whiskerRight œà yoneda)

theorem aboutParallelPairs {A B : C·µí·µñ ‚•§ Type v} (hA : IsIndObject A)
    (hB : IsIndObject B) (f g : A ‚ü∂ B) : Nonempty (CommonMorphismPresentation f g) := sorry
```

and together with the results of this PR I deduce `ClosedUnderLimitsOfShape WalkingParallelPair (IsIndObject (C := C))`. Proving `aboutParallelPairs` is a lot of work, but we will get there :)
